workspace.description: The Terraform workspace you would like to use. (Only required if you use workspaces.)

interactive.description: Should the Terraform CLI be allowed to prompt you? (Should be deactivated in the CI/CD pipeline.)

upgrade.description: Should the external provider versions be updated in the dependency lock file. Needs to be activated only once after a provider version update. (https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/language/files/dependency-lock)

args.description: Used to provide additional arguments to the Terraform CLI. (https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/init)

terraformDirectory.description: The name of the project directory where the *.tf files are stored.
